page.title: 19STROUD LIBRARY
page.content:
{Map Ref-:852054
The Stroud Library is housed in the modern building opposite the Museum in Landsdown.It is part of the Gloucestershire County Library and offers lending,information,reference and children's facilities. The main services are free to residents and visitors,and the library also has a cassette subscription service.There is a comprehensive collection of books on the Stroud area and an up-to-date index of local societies,their secretaries and meeting places. A mobile library,based in Stroud, serves the neighbouring village too small to have independent libraries.During the winter months the library holds a series of talks and record recitals.
